page.title: 14PROTESTANT RELIGIONS
page.content: In this area of North Blackburn there are three churches: St. Gabriel's,Holy Souls and Brownhill United Reform. Total Av. Sunday Attendance: St. Gabriel's 400/500 Holy Souls 600 Brownhill U.R.150/200 There is also a Methodist Church nearby which draws from this area. The churches also provide the area with many of its organisations,clubs and interests.The three churches get on wellith each other in a local council of churches. Each minister spoke of the wide range of social backgrounds represented in the congregations.
